text: talaka du'ibara, tarapara purodastura raksana nayata sundarabhabe bidaya dana. Ara tomadera jan'ya baidha naya tadera ya diyecha ta theke kichu phiriye neya, yadi na dujane'i asanka kare ye allah‌ra nirdesita sima kayema rakha tadera pakse sambhabapara naya. Kintu tomara yadi asanka kara ye tara allah‌ra gandira bhetare kayema thakate parabe na, ta hale tadera jan'ye aparadha habe na yara binimaye se mukta hate caya. E'isaba hacche allah‌ra nirdesita gandi, ata'eba e-saba langhana karo na, ara yara allah‌ra gandi langhana kare tara nijera'i hacche an'yayakari.
